H0.text: At an angle is how most waves strike the shore.

H1.text: Side on is how most waves strike the shore.

H2.text: Head on is how most waves strike the shore, rather than at an angle.

H3.text: At a distance is how most waves strike the shore, either head on or at an angle.

A4.text: waves on a shoreline tend to strike the shore close to a perpendicular angle
